text: (kya ukt vyakti achchha hai) ya vah vyakti jo raat kee ghadiyon mein sajada karata aur khada rahata hai, aakhirat se darata hai aur apane rab kee dayaaluta kee aasha rakhata hua vinayasheelata ke saath bandagee mein laga rahata hai? kaho, "kya ve log jo jaanate hai aur ve log jo nahin jaanate donon samaan honge? shiksha to buddhi aur samajhavaale hee grahan karate hai.
